briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of EXE844 Otic Suspension in Otitis Media at Time of Tympanostomy Tube Insertion (OMTT)
officialTitle: Safety and Efficacy of EXE844 Otic Suspension in the Treatment of Otitis Media at Time of Tympanostomy Tube Insertion
conditions: Otitis Media With Effusion in Children
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate EXE844 plus tympanostomy tubes compared to tympanostomy tubes only based on sustained clinical cure at end-of-therapy (EOT).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects With Sustained Clinical Cure at Day 8
